short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the ultimate way to add some fun and excitement to your browsing experience - our brand new Chrome extension that…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate way to add some fun and excitement to your browsing experience - our brand new Chrome extension that brings you a random fun fact every time you open a new tab! With this extension, you’ll never have a dull moment while browsing the web. Each fact is carefully curated to be interesting, entertaining, and informative. You’ll learn something new every day and have a blast doing it!

Our team of expert researchers has scoured the internet to bring you the most fascinating and intriguing facts from all corners of the world. From science and technology to history and culture, there’s something for everyone. And with new facts added regularly, you’ll never run out of things to discover.

But that’s not all - our extension is also incredibly easy to use. Simply install it on your Chrome browser and you’re good to go. Every time you open a new tab, a random fun fact will be displayed for your enjoyment. It’s that simple!

So why wait? Add some fun and excitement to your browsing experience with our Chrome extension. You won’t regret it!
